Description:
Model
Brand	Rosewill
Model	Helium Air White


Details
Type	ATX Mid Tower
Color	White
Case Material	Steel / Plastic
With Power Supply	No
Power Supply Mounted	Bottom
Motherboard Compatibility	ATX / E-ATX / ITX / Micro ATX
Side Panel Window	Mesh
Dust Filters	Yes


Expansion
Internal 3.5" Drive Bays	3
Internal 2.5" Drive Bays	4
Expansion Slots	7
Front Panel Ports
Front Ports	1 x USB 3.1 Type-C / 2 x USB 3.0 / Audio


Cooling System
Fan Options	Front: 3 x 120mm, 3 x 140mm, 2x 160mm
Top: 3 x 120mm, 2 x 140mm
Rear: 1x 120mm, 1 x 140mm (1 x 140mm Included)
Radiator Options	Front: 360mm / 240mm
Top: 360mm / 280mm / 240mm
Rear: 120mm


Dimensions & Weight
Max GPU Length	390 mm
Max CPU Cooler Height	183 mm
Max PSU Length	220 mm


Additional Info
Features	High-Airflow with All Mesh Panels: Three mesh panels provide massive airflow to your system, ensuring maximum cooling performance.

Cable Management System: A roomy 34mm of space behind the motherboard allows for quick and easy routing of all your major cables, keeping your build clean and organized.

Included 140mm PWM Fan: Comes with one pre-installed 140mm PWM fan for efficient cooling.

Extreme Cooling Potential: The spacious interior supports up to 7x 120mm or 6x 140mm cooling fans, and can accommodate multiple radiators, including 360mm radiator in both the front and top.

Modern Front Panel I/O: Features a USB 3.1 Type-C port, USB 3.0 port, and a combination audio/microphone jack for convenient access to your connections.

Tool-Free Design for All Panels: Easily access and customize your build with a completely tool-free design for all panels.
Label: Chasis Rosewill Helium Air White
